name: Running King
description: Help the King to run away from the crowd. Control the environment, not the character! You can also create levels by yourself via level editor which is available for Steam version. Create levels, share them with friends and have fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only) Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 430 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only) Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia 440 Storage: 250 MB available space
